name: Tower of Babel (itch)
description:
Tower of Babel

Explore the Tower of Babel!

A miner from Elam, you fall while working on the construction of a soaring tower meant to reach the heavens. When you wake up, you discover that everyone is gone. Uncover the story behind the tower and reunite with your people.

  • A chill exploration game
  • Explore 12+ floors
  • 30-40 minute play time
  • Saves automatically, so don't worry
  • There is indeed an ending
  • Cool music and SFX
Instructions

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Hold shift to sprint

Play

  • Use default settings when prompted
  • Macs
    • Run the exe file
  • Windows
    • Run the exe file in the folder
    • IMPORTANT - The .dll file and data folder must be in the same folder!

If something goes horribly wrong and you get stuck, hold '[' and ']' until it quits to reset the game.
